mapper.insert: INSERT INTO schedule (start_datetime, sequence, seats_count, performance_id) VALUES (#{startDatetime}, #{sequence}, #{seatsCount}, #{performanceId});
mapper.select: SELECT h.seats_count FROM performance as p JOIN hall as h ON p.hall_id = h.hall_id WHERE p.performance_id = #{performanceId};
SELECT schedule_id, start_datetime, sequence, seats_count, performance_id FROM schedule LIMIT #{offset}, #{size};
